verses.roman:
praṇāma kari' prabhu kailā caraṇa vandana
prabhure kahaye kichu hāsiyā vacana

synonyms: praṇāma kari'-offering obeisances; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kailā caraṇa vandana—offered respect at his feet; prabhure—to Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahaye—he says; kichu—some; hāsiyā—smiling; vacana—words.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu offered His obeisances to Rāmacandra Purī, worshiping his feet. Then Rāmacandra Purī smiled and spoke to the Lord.
